client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Client program that connects through the error detector to connect to the server and perform file operations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Client()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.net.DatagramPacket createPacket(byte[] opCode, byte[] data, int port)
      Creates datagram packet using port and data passed.

      Creates a datagram packet that holds the request using the OP code and file name on the server to perform the IO operations on, as well as the mode to perform them in.

      void run()
      Runs the UI and the commands entered until the user enters the "quit" command which closes the program.
      void sendAndReceive(java.net.DatagramPacket sendPacket)
      Method that sends the initial request to the server and keeps the server and client communicating until all of the data has been passed for the read/write operation.

      • sendAndReceive

        public void sendAndReceive(java.net.DatagramPacket sendPacket)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Method that sends the initial request to the server and keeps the server and client communicating until all of the data has been passed for the read/write operation.
        Parameters:
        sendPacket - Packet created for the initial request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if there is an error with the request sending or receiving

      • printMenu

        public void printMenu()
        Prints the UI menu options to stdout

      • createPacket

        public java.net.DatagramPacket createPacket(byte[] opCode,
                                   java.lang.String fileName,
                                   java.lang.String mode,
                                   java.lang.String saveLocation)
        Creates a datagram packet that holds the request using the OP code and file name on the server to perform the IO operations on, as well as the mode to perform them in.
        Parameters:
        opCode - 2 byte operation code
        fileName - File name on the server to perform IO on
        mode - mode for IO
        saveLocation - file save location
        Returns:
        Datagram packet created for request

      • createPacket

        public java.net.DatagramPacket createPacket(byte[] opCode,
                                   byte[] data,
                                   int port)
        Creates datagram packet using port and data passed.
        Parameters:
        opCode - 2 byte operation code
        data - byte array of data to send to server
        port - port to send data to
        Returns:
        Datagram packet for the request

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the UI and the commands entered until the user enters the "quit" command which closes the program.
